ModMetaData.name: Star Wars : Vehicles Re-Released
ModMetaData.author: Lee, MajesticMadman
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is a rerelease and a continuation of the mods from Majestic Madman. Since he has decided to retired from modding, I will be taking over and maintaining his excellent vehicle mods.
This contains 40+ vehicles from the Star Wars galaxy. This mod will support Aerocraft, SRTS, and Vehicle Framework. If none of the above are installed then it will just be props.
Credits Art -MajesticMadman SRTS Expanded - Smash Phil Kimoliga and Scyk Art - Guy762 Kang and Kom'rk Art - MrDylanScooty
